Key:
(I'm going to invite Origami to eat lunch with
me today.)

Whoa! W-Wait, Origami! I didn't say anything
ye—
You want to eat lunch with me. Am I wrong?

We're going to eat by the stairs over there.
That way, we'll be alone.

Oh, okay. It's a bit hot out, but eating outdoors
is always nice.

(Homemade Hamburg steak today. The shape's
kind of wonky, but... I know it'll taste good!)
Can I have the big one...?

Oh. Um, y-you're talking... about the steak,
right?

Okay, s-sure. The shape's a bit off, but it's
homemade so I guarantee it's good.
I don't mind. The shape doesn't matter to me.
Hurry up and give it to me.

A-Are you okay, Origami?! You look like
you're in a lot of pain.
I-I see... Glad to hear it.

The moment it entered my mouth, it was
juicy and delectable.

Y-Yeah. I made sure to prepare it with
that in mind. It had a lot of—

*grunt*! W-Well, it was homemade! I'm
happy you enjoyed it, so...
(Ha... Haha... Why am I so sweaty?)
